results.content: The instructor sounds a little bit monotonous, what makes it hard to listen after time. And also the examples/ practices are a bit boring (first explaining how it works and what you can do, then doing the same stuff in the exercise.) It would more help if the instructor would give an task to the audience and then show his solution in short
results.content_html: The instructor sounds a little bit monotonous, what makes it hard to listen after time. And also the examples/ practices are a bit boring (first explaining how it works and what you can do, then doing the same stuff in the exercise.) It would more help if the instructor would give an task to the audience and then show his solution in short

results.content: I'm currently working on two Gatsby projects at work, and this course is a great, thorough, easy to understand class that's been very beneficial to my fluency in Gatsby. The teacher does a great job covering everything you'll need to know to get started.
results.content_html: I'm currently working on two Gatsby projects at work, and this course is a great, thorough, easy to understand class that's been very beneficial to my fluency in Gatsby. The teacher does a great job covering everything you'll need to know to get started.

results.content: Great course. Excellent teaching. Would benefit from some headless CMS GraphQL queries and layout examples.

results.content: Gatsby is so easy ! a point made clear by this course

results.content:
I am on the initial phase of this course but the way Gatsby folder structure has been explained in this course itself clears alot of concepts. Because folder director is the primary place to understand, if you want to develop a skill's proficiency. 
Looking forward for the course ahead. 
Cheers !
